ðŸ“– Summary: H2O is an open-source, distributed machine learning platform that provides a wide range of algorithms and tools for building and deploying scalable models. It supports various programming languages and integrates seamlessly with big data technologies like Hadoop and Spark. H2O allows users to build, train, and deploy machine learning models for various applications.
